original_text: And there shall ye remember your ways, and all your doings, wherein ye have been defiled; and ye shall lothe yourselves in your own sight for all your evils that ye have committed.
korean_text: 거기에서 너희의 길과 스스로 더럽힌 모든 행위를 기억하고 이미 행한 모든 악으로 말미암아 스스로 미워하리라

sentences.original_text: And there shall ye remember your ways
and ye shall lothe yourselves in your own sight
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너희가 자기 눈에 너희 자신을 미워하리라

sentences.original_text: for all your evils that ye have committed
